content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetMetrics path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/metrics content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name startdate
desc the starting date to retrieve metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc the ending date to retrieve metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name granularity
in query
required false
schema
type str
default auto
name statuscategories
desc a commaseparated list of 1 digit http status codes categories to filter by
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name statuscodes
desc a commaseparated list of 3 digit http status codes to filter by
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name sites
desc a commaseparated list of site ids to filter metrics for
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name groupby
in query
required false
schema
type str
default none
name billingregions
desc a commaseparated list of billing regions to filter metrics for
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name pops
desc a commaseparated list of stackpath point of presence location codes to filter metrics for
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name platforms
desc a commaseparated list of billing platforms to filter metrics for
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name sitetypefilter
desc a filter to retrieve metrics by site type
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
name metrictype
in query
required false
schema
type str
default transfer
sum get metrics
desc the last 24 hours of metrics are retrieved if the start and end dates are not provided
responses
200
